name: Shinobi Blitz - Fall 2017 - 470
description:
470 game project: Shinobi Blitz is a tower defense game with a Japanese theme to it. Place towers, level them up and defend your castle from waves of enemies using traps and towers. This is a strategy style game, player vs. computer. 

Players have a handful of lives and if too many enemies pass through their defenses they lose. 

Credits: Lucky 7 Productions; James Tran, Alex Young, Owen Goodwin, Neil Tarkington

Single Player Game
